oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1945-09-08 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Prince Albert sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Roy Acuff (host, performer), the Duke of Paducah (performer), the Old Hickory Singers (performers), Tommy Magness (performer), Mac McGar (performer), Minnie Pearl (performer), Rachel Veach (performer), and Bashful Brother Oswald (performer) from September 8, 1945 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Old Hickory Singers; Tommy Magness; Rachel Veach; Bashful Brother Oswald; Minnie Pearl; Mac McGar
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Louis Buck talks and introduces Roy Acuff -- Roy Acuff talks and introduces the first tune -- My Old Pal Of Yesterday (Roy Acuff) -- Roy Acuff talks and introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- Down By The Old Mill Stream (Old Hickory Singers) -- Roy Acuff talks and introduces [Unidentified] -- Comedy routine ([Unidentified]) -- Roy Acuff introduces Tommy Magness -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Tommy Magness) -- Prince Albert commercial (Louis Buck) -- Prince Albert jingle (Old Hickory Singers) -- Roy Acuff introduces Rachel Veach and Bashful Brother Oswald -- I'm Just Here To Get My Baby Out Of Jail (Rachel Veach, Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks and introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Roy Acuff introduces Mac McGar -- Honeysuckle Rose (Mac McGar mandolin) -- Prince Albert plug (Roy Acuff) -- Shake Hands With Mother Again (Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Louis Buck) -- When You And I Were Young, Maggie (Old Hickory Singers) -- Sally Goodin (Tommy Magness fiddle, Roy Acuff call-outs) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff, Louis Buck) -- Waste Paper Collection commercial -- NBC plug and tone
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Acuff, Roy, 1903-1992; Old Hickory Singers; Magness, Tommy; McGar, Mac; Veach, Rachel; Bashful Brother Oswald; Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996;
